Meanwhile, Agapito Berlinches, a right-wing politician, surprises the president of his party with a young girl in his office; Agapito mounted such a mess trying to explain the event that the press has just published that he is gay and was caught with a transvestite. when Cazorla read the press decides to introduce Berlinches as his best friend.","popularity":3.009,"poster_path":"/oUTEQAU04CQ10Wg4BI8dnkF8huw.jpg","release_date":"1986-04-04","title":"Reir más es imposible","video":true,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/BgkMFBw1kz4RO0Ev56W8AooLNr.jpg","genre_ids":[18,35,10749],"id":10989,"original_language":"is","original_title":"101 Reykjavík","overview":"Thirty-year-old Hlynur still lives with his mother and spends his days drinking, watching porn and surfing the net while living off unemployment checks. On New Year's Eve, while his mother is away, Hlynur finds out Lola is a lesbian, but also ends up having sex with her. He soon finds out he and his mother are sharing more than a house.
